text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Kayleigh, what about that huge lie you told on fox news, Trump will not let the Coronavirus come to the United States. That's the kind of stupid crap Trump would say. Are you kin to Kellyanne? You, Trump, Kellyanne & Steve Miller could be the four horsemen. Ya'll have gotta go.
